name: Crafted_Shield_Wall_D
display_help: Enhances the defense of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Defense.Scale}%, reduces endurance costs by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. NOTE: This is a PvP enhancement, this type of enhancement has two groups of set bonuses. You get the set bonuses not marked "(PvP)" while experiencing PvE content, but you get both the PvP set bonuses and the PvE set bonuses when fighting players.
power_short_helps: Enhances Defense, Reduces Endurance Cost and Increases Attack Rate
